## IApi.deviceAdded property

An observable which emits newly discovered Jabra devices. The emitted device object can be consumed by the third party developer. See [IDevice](./jabra-js.idevice.md) for more information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deviceAdded: Observable<IDevice>;
```
